Package moblima.dao

Class MovieDao

java.lang.Object
moblima.dao.MovieDao
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Dao<Movie>
public class MovieDao extends Object implements Dao<Movie>, Serializable
DAO Interface for Movie Reads and writes to movie.dat
